brightdata/brightdata-mcp

MCP server enabling Claude Desktop, Cursor & other AI clients to scrape web data without blocks or CAPTCHAs

Related repos

  • AI agents getting real-time web data with Browserai MCP
  • Headless browser for AI agents
  • browser-based MCP for AI assistants in web apps
  • Desktop AI assistant and MCP client
  • Web interface for RemoteApps and Desktops
  • web scraping and automation server for Hyperbrowser
